title: STEP 2/2: UPDATING LEAGUE OF LEGENDS l Applying patches... 99%
body: I've tried everything "delete files, redownload, repair, turn off firewall, change region, copy "S_OK" and paste to another file," Nothing works .... this happened a couple days ago and sometimes i get this error "unspecified error" i don't know what to do please HELP.

replies.body: If you're getting stuck at 99% then there may be a slow or poor connection problem failing to download all necessary updates, so the patcher is trying to go back and collect any data that has been missed.  Unless you get an error, it's best to let it finish what it's doing as closing it could cause the system to recan every file for corruption.  I recommend using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network and keep it steady.  Let me know if you have any questions.

I have the same problem... someone please help! I downloaded the hextech repair tool, i uninstalled and reinstalled, i did a clean uninstall too, and I have no idea why it won't patch. It just keeps says "calculating differences/x files scanned" until the the unspecified error message pops up. Please help! :)
